name: Flair Strainers
overview:
Since our establishment in year 2003, we, “Flair Strainers & Filters”, are a trustworthy organization engaged in manufacturing and supplying a comprehensive range of Flair Strainers & Filters.

Our products: we offer Auto Back Wash Filter, Y, T & Conical Strainer, Basket & Pot Filter, Pressure Sand, Three Way Ball Valve, Cartridge & Bag Filter and Self Cleaning Filter.

Our Team: Fostered by a team of competent and passionate professionals, which is driving force for our organization. Well versed with their respective domain, these professionals helps us in developing our range of Auto Back Wash Filter, Y, T & Conical Strainers, Basket & Pot Filter, Pressure Sand Filters, Three Way Ball Valve, Cartridge & Bag Filter and Self Cleaning Filter.

Infrastructure: We have developed a state-of-the-art infrastructure unit at our premises, which enable to offer a quality-approved range of Auto Back Wash Filter, Y, T & Conical Strainers, Basket & Pot Filter, Pressure Sand, Three Way Ball Valve, Cartridge & Bag Filter and Self Cleaning Filter.

Quality Policy / Processes: Being a quality-centric organization, we strive to offer our clients with the quality assured range of Auto Back Wash Filter, Y, T & Conical Strainer, Basket & Pot Filter, Pressure Sand, Three Way Ball Valve, Cartridge & Bag Filter and Self Cleaning Filter.

Client Satisfaction: Attaining maximum satisfaction of our clients is the ultimate goal of an organization. To maximize the satisfaction of our clients, we are engaged in manufacturing a comprehensive range of Auto Back Wash Filter, Y, T & Conical Strainer, Basket & Pot Filter, Pressure Sand, Three Way Ball Valve, Cartridge & Bag Filter and Self Cleaning Filter.
